participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, but a bit clumsy.
participant_1.background: i have a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i am always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and friendly, loves staying active.
participant_2.background: i've short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored.

content.text:
Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?.
Cut a long story short: i have broken arm
